column1: Local Foods////My favorite sandwiches are the duck confit
column3: and the truffled egg on pretzel bun. These three sandwiches are consistently delicious and filling
column4: enough for a good meal now and a snack later. My favorite soups are the vegan chili (I'm the opposite of a vegetarian
column5: but this stuff is so good!)
column8: the avocado soup. Things I didn't love include: any sandwiches with horseradish (they put way too much in and it overpowers all the other flavors)
column9: most of the sides (they're all really 'healthy' and taste odd
column10: except the kale which is tasty)
column11: and the crunchy chicken sandwich (everyone seems to love it
column12: but it wasn't anything spectacular to me and the chicken came cold).
